text: "Big Shot" is a 1979 song by Billy Joel and is the second single from his sixth studio album 52nd Street. It went to number 13 in Canada, number 14 in the United States, number 36 in New Zealand, number 91 in Australia and did not chart in the United Kingdom. Category:1979 songs Category:Billy Joel songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Power pop songs
title: Big Shot (song)
